summary: A young boy's father is lynched before his eyes; fifteen years later he returns home for revenge.
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Priyanka Chopra|Sanjay Dutt|Rishi Kapoor|Madhurjeet Sarghi|Rajesh Tandon|Kanika Tiwari|Om Puri|Vishal C. Bhardwaj|Arush Bhiwandiwala|Deven Bhojani|Sunil Chauhan|Ravi Jhankal|Shikha Joshi|Ayesha Kaduskar|Katrina Kaif|Brijendra Kala|Sachin Khedekar|Bobby Kumar|Chetan Pandit|Jakee Patel|Neeraj Sood|Aditya Surve|Banwarilal Taneja|Suhita Thatte|Pankaj Tripathi|Rajesh Vivek|Zarina Wahab
title: Agneepath
